title: MarketWatch - How the Pandemic Has Affected Your Retirement
description: MarketWatch's retirement reporter, Alessandra Malito, speaks with Teresa Ghilarducci, director of the Schwartz Center for Economic Policy Analysis, about how the pandemic has affected retirement savers.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: MarketWatch's retirement reporter, Alessandra Malito, speaks with Teresa Ghilarducci, director of the Schwartz Center for Economic Policy Analysis, about how the pandemic has affected retirement savers.
